body: The plot thickens
On the next episode of "As The Siblings Screw"............

@CulturedSubaru I gotta disagree with @A-san. Considering how the siblings are, she just seems to be messing around instead of actually wanting to do anything with Masato, likely to make Rei jealous. 

A big giveaway is her asking in front of her brother. She would've done it in private if she was serious, so clearly not.
Came for the porn stayed for the plot
What the fuckkkkk this plot is intense, thank you based translator

@CulturedSubaru : She really did wanted to, but Masato declined as he treasured relationships with the siblings very greatly and doesn't want to change it. It's also shown that the siblings are having abnormal interest in each other so Mei tried to vent it out on Masato instead, then things escalated as Rei steps in to "comfort" her since he knows full well that without Masato, she'll have no one else in the world anymore...That's a good plot but I think the execution is anything but "hentai logic", as the storyline is so good these out-of-nowhere sex scenes just ruined it. It could've been much better if sex scenes happens after their relationships became truly fruition. You can think of Re:Zero, but with Rem suddenly having sex with Subaru right after she confessed to him in SS1. Then again, this is but a porno so...

I forgot that Mei "wanted" to fuck Masato at the first chapter, or maybe she just wanted to make Rei jealous?
This doujin os definitely great. Can't even fap from how thicc this plot is
the plot and sister, both are thicc af
So i am confusion.
Looking forward to how the relationship of the sibling's pan out, can't wait for the next part.
Complete 180 from the girl trying to fuck the guy in front of her brother to fucking her brother instead
SO its not that weird, if you are invested in the plot from the beginning its not a surprise if you did not nut.
Stopped fapping 2 chapters ago, staying for the plot lol

Bitch
The story is way hotter than the porn.

I am so exited for the next chapter.
I’m confused. Someone explain story
@A-san If it's really that good it'll get its fair share. Lot of VN's got plenty sex scenes but still manage to get a proper clean manga or anime if the plot and story are really that good.
Damn... i'm hooked, can't wait for next.
nice read
I can't even begin to describe how little I care about this stupid fucking plot lol

@KenGotTheLexGs : Thank you for listening to my request. To me, Fuuga isn't like those big name H mangakas like Homunculus (god bless them) or Kakao (same!). His arts style is somewhat... unique so it couldn't attracted mainstream H readers. All his works only serialized in certain magazines and that's it. No overseas licensed, OVA, no other products (try selling Mei tapestry or Dakimakura - nope, it won't sell much lol) so... encouraging the readers who can afford to support him by buying his work from official sites is the way IMO.

If any of you guys are interested in doing so, here is a link where you can purchase an electronic copy: https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/search/search.php?name=楓牙&text_type=author

They literally cost at most $11-12 in US dollars so it’s not that expensive so please consider supporting if you have been enjoying Fuuga’s work & have the money to do so.

@A-san, you bring up a good point. I appreciate the fact that you’re concerned about actually supporting him. I was actually thinking of doing that but I was thinking of doing it at the end when I’ve translated all of the tankoubon chapters. But you’re right, I’m translating Fuuga’s works because they definitely need more attention so I will do so from now on.
Forget the sex scenes, this shit is getting good!
The guy looks like Hikigaya 😆
I love the incest relationship between them, but I think I love the plot more lol, we're getting close to the end of this series.
Good read :3

@KenGotTheLexGs : You did a good job translating such good manga, but why you can put your thoughts & comments in it BUT still no message to encourage the reader to actually support the mangaka by buying hard & digital copy so far when it's clearly out there is beyond me. It took like 10 minutes to write one more page, even most of them will just ignore it, you know.

See? This is what happens when you have a plot too good for being a H manga. Normally, the mangaka just ain't sure what if their work will sell enough and have no choice but to put the porn into it to make sure it sells... which to me, that's why I think this could've been better.  This is like  "Your Name" or "Weathering with You" with full-blown sex scenes in it. Both H and stories are awesome but it's a shame you couldn't help but feel those great sex scenes purpose's are but attracting the crowd, I'd say.
holy shit this needs an anime
If you ignore the porn part  this is actually a nice manga
